subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Turkish club Besiktas, which recently signed the Nets’ Deron Williams, has made an offer to Lakers guard Kobe Bryant to play during the N.B.A. lockout, its coach said Friday.
snippet: The Turkish club Besiktas, which recently signed the Nets’ Deron Williams, has made an offer to Lakers guard Kobe Bryant to play during the N.B.A. lockout, its coach said Friday.
